import React from 'react'; import '../styles/InsightsExtras.css'; function ArrivalBoard({ arrivals = [] }) { return (

Arrival & Departure Radar

Upcoming check-ins and their departure windows.

{arrivals.length > 0 ? (
{arrivals.map(item => ( ))}
Arrival Guest Area Nights Status Departure
{new Date(item.booking_date).toLocaleDateString()} {item.guest_name}{item.group_type || ''} {item.area_rented} {item.nights} {item.status?.split('-').map(part => part.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + part.slice(1)).join(' ')} {item.departure_date}
) : (

No arrivals scheduled in the next two weeks.

)}
); } export default ArrivalBoard;
